Solver Documentation¶

Main module for solving the Schrödinger equation for various scenarios. This module reads input files, solves the equation, and saves the results.

main.main_command_line_interface()¶

CLI handler for the main module.

main.process_and_save_scenarios(arguments)¶

Main function that processes scenarios and saves the data.

main.save_data_to_file(filename, data_array)¶

Saves the data to a file.

Schroedinger Equation
